title: Does the patcher save its download progress? a response from Riot itself would be nice
body: alright so i've tried to run the download for this game a few times, i've completed the first step of the download, now i think it's downloading 3GB worth of patches, which is fine, so i get through most of it and hit my data cap on the last 1 gb...$10 gone, whatever that's fine. thinking i'd just get the extra GB and finish it i start it up again...3000MB again, okay that must be a mistake i'll let it download the GB, open up the launcher and it's back to 3GB, thinking that must just be a mistake and i must still only have a GB to go (because honestly it's 2016, how is this a problem) hits the cap stops the download, so i think hmm maybe it's down to the last few MB the patcher just isn't showing....come on guys, i stopped playing this for 3 years and you're patching system is STILL on point...for microsoft 2003. why won't it save where i've downloaded too? and how do i make it start saving what i have downloaded? and please don't give me the "blame riot blah blah" and "it must be your internet stop downloading porn" because the problem seems to be pretty common, a response from riot would be nice because in none of the other posts was a response from riot, only senior community members, i'm not really wanting a "quick fix" as now i'll wait a week or two to try finish the download, but that's $30 wasted, bugger all in the grand scheme of things but this is a common problem riot, when will you be addressing this? if ever? your patching stytem is not "fine" put some of that money i've spent buying characters and things to pay your staff into making them work! all they do is game balance, i'm pretty sure you can afford to pay a few people to fix the patcher, or atleast update the damn thing. If the plan is "ignore this until people stop whinging" be honest, say somewhere that your patching system doesn't save what it's downloaded so people don't make the same mistake i do.

replies.body:
Hello Fazedbyzero,

I see that you have looked around the board a bunch to see if you can find a way to solve your problem. I am not sure which posts you looked at, but I would recommend seeing if you haven't tried something listed on the [official article provided by Riot's support about Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues).

This board is actually intended for community members helping each other out, not for Riot to help with problems. If you would like Riot staff to directly address the problem you are having, I would recommend submitting a support ticket directly to them. You can do [that at this link](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

I hope that your problem is resolved promptly.
